name: Surf
description: You summon a fast-moving wave in front of you that crashes down on creatures in a 30 foot cone. Any creature caught in the blast must make a STR saving throw, taking 2d8 + MOVE water damage and falling prone on a failure, or half as much without falling prone on a success.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.

contest.effect: Startles all of the Pokemon to act before the user.
